name: OrthoPaint
description:
Note: This probably won't work well in your browser. Try one of the desktop releases instead!

The gist for the main.rb is posted here:

https://gist.github.com/TheEyesightDim/c98fa7035d1309670771911f2ff5c120

This is my first ever published project with the DragonRuby engine. I had a lot of fun making it over a couple of days, but it's rife with some bad patterns. Still, you may hopefully enjoy it and find some useful information for your own DR projects. Thank you very much for checking it out!
